title: Drawing, "Vanity, Two Variations", early 20th century
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions, instructions in graphite; lower right in graphite: P. already shown; lower right in graphite: 7142/29"L [circled]; center, middle in graphite: 7680/48" [circled
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of a vanity and perspective drawing for a side table. Vanity is rectangular on the left side with a rounded corner on the right. Drawer on the right side with rectangular pull is on top of the desk surface. Rounded surface extends from top of drawer at left to the ground to form leg. Long rectangular desk/end table in upper portion of drawing. Two sides of the top of the table curve upward, and legs of table at each side curve downward. Three drawers between top and frame of desk; largest drawer at center and two smaller drawers at sides with rectangular pulls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vanity, Two Variations", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1266.
